content: प्रत्यादेशः {@--1@} An order, a command. {@--2@} Information, declaration. {@--3@} Refusal, denial, rejection, repulse, repudiation. प्रत्यादेशान्न खलु भवतो धीरतां कल्पयामि <ls>Me. 114</ls>; <ls n="Me.">95</ls>; <ls>Ś. 6. 8.</ls> {@--4@} Obscuring, eclipsing, one that obscures, puts to shame or throws into shade; या प्रत्यादेशो रूपगर्वितायाः श्रियः <ls>V. 1</ls>; <ls>K. 5.</ls> {@--5@} Caution, warning. {@--6@} Particularly, divine caution, supernatural warning. {@--7@} Reproach.
